channel.title: Why Wont my Added NPC Shopkeeper Trade me
channel.description: I added items, spawned him, the NPC is there, but when i click trade my character turns to him but it does nothing.

Instead of spacing did you [TAB] ?

item.title: Why Wont my Added NPC Shopkeeper Trade me
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

f1rey wav3:

I added items, spawned him, the NPC is there, but when i click trade my character turns to him but it does nothing. Although once, i spawned a shopkeeper but didnt put anything in shops.cfg and it automatically sold general store items

wanaShop = X

x = shop value

Read full topic

item.title: Why Wont my Added NPC Shopkeeper Trade me
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

Ok heres what my autospawn file looks like…

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 1917 2964 3384 0 1000 4242 5151 5151 1 StationaryNPC
spawn = 521 2963 3383 0 1000 4242 5151 5151 1 StationaryNPC
spawn = 520 2965 3383 0 1000 4242 5151 5151 1 StationaryNPC
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

These are the 3 i made with a ShopMaker, the needed filies are also in shops.cfg and client.java

I couldnt include every single code because it was too many characters

Read full topic

Post all the codes you used.
